Alumni.name: Akash Roy Choudhury
Alumni.comment: I joined KRS in my 2nd year, after that a new journey started which got me where I am today. I saw it evolving in multiple folds. For me it was not only a technical society, Co-ordination, Management, Team Building, Organising, everything was a part of it. I got the right exposure for the journey ahead of time. And my seniors were always there for me, even today I can say so. KRS is not a society, it's a family.

Alumni.name: Akriti Raj
Alumni.comment: It's a work culture comprising of immense talent and potential held together by their passion, curiosity and dedication ❤️

Alumni.name: Arijit Dutta
Alumni.comment: KRS is not just any society, its like a family , a very big family where you can come any time you like but you can never leave... Nostalgia hits upon inward eyes everytime while trying to share memories of KRS, words fall short.. lots of love and best wishes for all my juniors , keep up the good work and make KRS shine always..

Alumni.name: Ashutosh Kumar
Alumni.comment: It’s a Family!

Alumni.name: Ayush Dishu
Alumni.comment: KIIT Robotics society is the best thing that happend to me in my college life...it gives me the opportunity to excel myself in every field...I am always thankful to it ♥️

Alumni.name: Baishali Chakraborty
Alumni.comment: KRS is not only a society, it's a Family to me. Besides all the learnings and experiences that I have gained from KRS, I must say I got a bunch of juniors to cherish for lifetime. My memories and moments with KRS are the ones, that I will live hundred times over if given a chance. The platform it provides you to grow both technically and morally is tremendous. If college was life, KRS would be my Heartbeat . ❤️

Alumni.name: Bishal Biswas
Alumni.comment: My family

Alumni.name: Debasish Dhar
Alumni.comment: KRS wasnt just a society for me, it was an emotion for me. Getting into KRS was my dream and taking it where it is today was my ambition. I got a wonderful family at KRS and it had taught me so much in my life. KRS  is one of the best thing that happened to me. KRS is a big reason for what I am today and what I will be tomorrow.

Alumni.name: Himanshu kumar
Alumni.comment: Its not just a society its like a whole family. Where we all learn , build and develop our technical skills. I wish all the members to make our society and college proud all around with theirs excellent work.

Alumni.name: Ipsita Patra
Alumni.comment: KRS to me is family. From robotics to learning life lessons, from seniors' guidance to juniors' love, from having fun together to crying on getting separated, bond that KRS has given me is priceless. And i miss u all. Stay together, Grow together❣️.

Alumni.name: Nidhi Kumari
Alumni.comment: KRS is family. It's a complete package - the thrill of making the bots, taking classes, the excitement of participating/organising the events; it will truely reignite the Engineer within you. Even after years of graduating from KIIT, KRS will be a place where you will always feel welcomed. KRS is not just a society, but an emotion.

Alumni.name: Nitin Poddar
Alumni.comment: Kiit Robotics Society has helped me gain some great interpersonal skill besides technical hand-on experience, these skills were addon for me and I could easily use them at my campus placement and at my first company, Deloitte!

Alumni.name: Priyanshu Saxena
Alumni.comment: KRS-This word is full of emotions, drama, logic, Run time errors, lovely juniors and what not. It helped me develop my personality and pursue my ambitions. I have been associated with many societies during my college days but KRS is never a society for me. Its my Home. Its where i can be me. Its a Family. Till now i have participated and coordinated in my events and workshops as KRS member. Yes i said Till Now because u can become an alumnus to college but KRS is a place where you are welcomed any time any where. Looking forward to more events and more workshops. And too many more lovely juniors.

Alumni.name: Pubali Das Gupta
Alumni.comment: KRS is a perfect for getting all possible knowledge of Robotics. It is a family away from home. In short, a perfect place for knowledge, fun and gaining experience.

Alumni.name: Sandipan Chakraborty
Alumni.comment: Excellent society to grow your Robotics passion.

Alumni.name: Saswata Bose
Alumni.comment: The family where inspiration & innovation leads you to success

Alumni.name: Sourav Misra
Alumni.comment: KRS may be a technical society but for me KRS was more than a society I came across...KRS not only give knowledge but give beloved brothers sisters and friends in college..A family I miss every day in my life

Alumni.name: Subhadip Mondal
Alumni.comment: It's great. I became the part of KRS in the 3rd year that too as a Graphic Designer. Attended IoT workshop and also Vidnan. The journey was amazing. People are very much dedicated to Robotics and that makes it the official robotics society for KIIT. They learn, they grow and they help people, who are interested, to grow. The weekly classes give a lot of opportunity to learn about Robotics. Proud to be a part of KRS.

Alumni.name: Sudip Roy
Alumni.comment: I miss the gathering at KRS room and most importantly all the juniors and their commitments to every piece of DIY's and their passion to achieve something out of it. With great ideas comes our innovativeness!

Alumni.name: Sujayeeta Chakraborty
Alumni.comment: KRS was the very first society I had joined and this is the platform that gave me immense knowledge...seniors were so helpful and kind to us and juniors are also very obidient and hard working..I really miss my family.

Alumni.name: Uditnarayan Mandal
Alumni.comment: The place where we try to implement new concept and prepare for techfest competitions.

Alumni.name: Vishesh Chhabra
Alumni.comment: Workplace comprising of talented and potential budding engineers united with passion and dedication
